Base:Descriptions.Base:Description:
A pair of {? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | classically elegant 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material)| simplistically elegant $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) ball stud} earrings with $(this.trait:material) posts and matching clutches. {? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | The outer edges of the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) settings have been encrusted with a surround of the tiniest $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems, lending the $(this.trait:brief) an overall dazzling appearance.} $(this.trait:engraving)
$(this.quality_description)

A pair of {? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | classically elegant 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material)| simplistically elegant $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) ball stud} earrings with $(this.trait:material) posts and matching clutches. {? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | The outer edges of the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) settings have been encrusted with a surround of the tiniest $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems, lending the $(this.trait:brief) an overall dazzling appearance.} $(this.trait:engraving)
$(this.quality_description)

A 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) gem graces either $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief). {? | ($(this.trait:gempieces:material)) | The $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) settings have been encrusted with a surround of the tiniest $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) gems, lending the $(this.trait:brief) an overall dazzling appearance.}

A 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) gem graces either $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief). {? | ($(this.trait:gempieces:material)) | The $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) settings have been encrusted with a surround of the tiniest $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) gems, lending the $(this.trait:brief) an overall dazzling appearance.}
the tiny $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems encrusting the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) of $(this.trait:brief)

{? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | The central, 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) gems have been encrusted with a surround of the tiniest $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems, lending the $(this.trait:brief) an overall dazzling appearance.| The classically tasteful, $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) ball shaped studs have been encrusted with the tiniest of $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems inset into their orbicular surface, lending the $(this.trait:brief) an overall dazzling appearance.}

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] Set(\$this, "details:gempiecest:sname:" +\$this."trait:gempieces:material"+ ":local", 1); Set(\$this, "details:gempieces:sname:gempieces:local", 1); return Call(\$\{Ironclaw:Lib:Crafting:Lib\}, "replaceadj", \$object: this, \$detail: "gempieces"); return TRUE;
